translation.en: [man over radio] Jane, go do your rounds. I'll come down and cover the desk.
translation.it: Jane, fai il tuo giro. Scendo a coprire la scrivania.

translation.en: [woman] On my way.
[man] This is Detective Wade Rollins with the Portland PD.
translation.it: Detective Wade Rollins, polizia di Portland.

translation.en: Leave your name and number, and I'll get back to you.
translation.it: Lasciate un recapito e vi richiamerò.

translation.en: Detective, uh… [sniffles] This is Andrea Bowen again.
translation.it: Detective, sono di nuovo Andrea Bowen.

translation.en: Sorry. Uh…
I know it's late, but could you call me back when you can?
translation.it: So che è tardi, ma potrebbe chiamarmi appena può?

translation.en: I-- [shudders] I'd really appreciate it.
[shakily] I'm just really scared, and I just…
I feel like he's still watching me.
translation.it: Sento che mi sta ancora osservando.

translation.en: [man] Andrea, this is how the world ends.
translation.it: Andrea, è così che finisce il mondo.

translation.en: [sobbing] No.
-[tense, fast-paced music] -[yelling] No!
No, no, no! No!
Help!
No! No…
Help!
Help! Somebody! No!
No! Help!
-[music continues over speakers] -[woman] Hi, sorry. I had a bottle of wine, but I drank it,
translation.it: Ciao, scusa. Avevo del vino, ma l'ho bevuto,

translation.en: so I brought you this plant, which I'm now noticing is dead.
translation.it: allora ti ho preso una pianta, ma vedo che è morta.

translation.en: -I called you five times. -What's wrong?
translation.it: - Ti ho chiamata più volte. - Perché?

translation.en: Jenn, Brian's here.
I know, I'm sorry. It's just-- Originally, you weren't coming, and then Scott invited him,
translation.it: Già. Mi spiace. Prima avevi declinato, allora Scott l'ha invitato

translation.en: and I had absolutely no idea. So…
translation.it: e io non ne avevo idea. Quindi…

translation.en: Yeah, I could just… tell everyone you're not feeling well, you know?
translation.it: Sì, potrei dire a tutti che non ti senti bene.

translation.en: I think I need a glass of wine.
translation.it: Devo bere un po' di vino.

translation.en: Hey, Jenn!
Hey, Scotty.
Hey, I am so sorry.
Yes, yes, he is.
-You don't have to apologize. -He does.
She told me a week ago that you weren't coming.
translation.it: Mi aveva detto che non venivi.

translation.en: -It's her fault. -Okay. Stop.
You don't know what's happening, so walk away.
translation.it: Non sai cosa sta succedendo, quindi aria.

translation.en: -Okay, that's really cute. -I love you. [chuckles]
[woman] Oh, it's Dr. Meade!
[chuckling] Hi. Dr. Meade.
Hi.
This is Jenn. As in, "The Jenn."
-Yes. I'm "The Jenn," apparently. -[Meade] Ah!
translation.it: Sì. Sono "quella Jenn", a quanto pare.

translation.en: -Collin Meade. Very nice to meet you. -[woman] He's magical. Changed my life.
translation.it: - Collin Meade. Piacere. - È magico. Mi ha cambiato la vita.

translation.en: I got the promotion, like, a month after working with you?
translation.it: Un mese di analisi con lei e ho avuto la promozione.

translation.en: And this house. You should totally go see him.
What? Everyone needs therapy.
-That's what you say, right? -You know where the ice tongs are?
translation.it: - Non è quello che dice? - Dove sono le pinze?

translation.en: -It's by the ice bucket, Scott. -[Scott] They're not there.
translation.it: - Vicino al secchiello del ghiaccio. - Non ci sono.

translation.en: Babe. Seriously, every time! I put them beside the ice thing.
translation.it: Tesoro. È sempre così. Le ho messe accanto al ghiaccio.

translation.en: It's not every time. [continues inaudibly]
Didn't know therapists could hang out with their clients.
I mean, I follow the rules 99% of the time.
translation.it: Io seguo le regole il 99% delle volte.

translation.en: Maybe 95?
It was nice meeting you.
-Cheers to your new house. -My new house!
translation.it: - Salute. - Alla tua nuova casa. La mia nuova casa!

translation.en: So, Brian, how's Foghorn?
What's Foghorn?
-It's a stupid name, is what it is. -No, what is it?
translation.it: - È un nome stupido, ecco cos'è. - No, che cos'è?

translation.en: Uh, the guys created a new software for some big audio engineer.
translation.it: Hanno creato un nuovo software per un rinomato ingegnere del suono.

translation.en: I just helped write some of the code.
translation.it: Io ho dato una mano col codice.

translation.en: What about you, Jennifer?
Oh, sorry. What?
Oh, no. I was just, uh--
What do you do?
I'm just-- Um, I'm sort of in between jobs at the moment.
translation.it: Al momento sono tra un lavoro e l'altro.

translation.en: She's just being modest. Jenny is actually a killer software engineer.
translation.it: Fa la modesta. È un ingegnere di software da paura.

translation.en: -Impressive. -[Jenn] Mm-hmm.
-So, you two ever worked together? -Brian!
translation.it: - Avete mai lavorato insieme voi due? - Brian!

translation.en: Um… Is there sesame in that? [gasps] Oh my God! Brian, I'm so sorry.
translation.it: - C'è del sesamo dentro? - Oh, mio Dio! Brian, mi dispiace tanto.

translation.en: [Brian] It's okay. It's okay.
Wow, that would've sucked if you died in our new house, dude.
translation.it: Che orrore se fossi morto nella nostra nuova casa.

translation.en: You know what? I think I'm gonna leave this right here.
translation.it: Sapete cosa? Credo che lascerò questa qui.

translation.en: Just in case. [chuckles]
-[mouthing] You okay? -Yeah, I'm good.
-Jennifer. -Hm. Yes?
I'm headed out, but, uh, I wanted to leave you this.
translation.it: Sto andando, ma volevo lasciarti questo.

translation.en: -In case you're interested. -Okay.
Good night.
You too.
Yeah. "Viola will be here in nine minutes."
Thanks for saving my life.
Don't mention it.
Good night, Jenny.
Good night.
Yeah?
I have tried really hard not to bother you, but…
translation.it: Ho cercato di non disturbarti, ma…

translation.en: I think about you all the time, and I just--
I miss you.
I didn't ask you to stay away because you bother me.
translation.it: Non ti ho allontanato perché mi disturbi.

translation.en: Yeah. I know--
Then don't say things like that.
When you say things like that, you make me sound like the bad guy,
translation.it: Quando dici certe cose, mi fai sembrare la cattiva

translation.en: and I'm not the bad guy. I'm--
You're not the bad guy. I'm not saying you are.
translation.it: Non dico che sei tu il cattivo.

translation.en: I'm just-- Oh God, what am I saying? I don't know what I'm saying.
translation.it: È che… Oh Dio! Che sto dicendo? Non so cosa sto dicendo.

translation.en: Can I give you a ride home?
-I don't think that's a good id-- -[Brian] It's just a ride, Jenny.
translation.it: - Non è una buona idea… - È solo un passaggio, Jenny.

translation.en: [woman] You guys had sex?
-Do you plan on getting back together? -No.
I'm stupid. Oh God, I'm the most stupid.
translation.it: Sono stupida. Oddio, sono così stupida.

translation.en: Oh my gosh, you're not. You're not stupid. You're just-- You're--
translation.it: Oddio, non è vero. Non sei stupida. Sei…

translation.en: -You're unhappy. -Yeah, everyone's unhappy.
translation.it: - Sei infelice. - Sì, lo sono tutti.

translation.en: No. I'm happy. Scott's happy.
translation.it: No. Io sono felice. Scott è felice.

translation.en: And for the most part, I hate to say this to you,
translation.it: E per lo più, detesto dirtelo,

translation.en: but Brian is happy.
What am I supposed to say to that?
[clicks tongue] I think you should see Dr. Meade.
-Who's Dr. Meade? -My therapist.
-Gina, I'll never do that. -You met him. He's tall, handsome.
translation.it: - No, escluso. - Quello di ieri sera. È bello.

translation.en: -No. -Come on.
Hear me out, okay? You're isolating. You're unemployed.
translation.it: Ascoltami, ok? Ti stai isolando. Sei disoccupata.

translation.en: Don't pretend like you're not.
And you slept with your ex-fiancé last night.
translation.it: E ieri hai fatto sesso col tuo ex.

translation.en: -Your life is a vortex of crap right now. -This is so much fun.
translation.it: - La tua vita fa schifo al momento. - Che allegria.

translation.en: Can you just go for me, please?
translation.it: Puoi andarci per me, per favore?

translation.en: -Ugh, fine. Once. -Great!
I made you an appointment for Friday.
You should've seen me when I started with him.
translation.it: Dovevi vedermi quando ho iniziato con lui.

translation.en: Oh, sorry?
I pull my hair.
OCD.
Whatever you're here for, Dr. Meade will fix it.
translation.it: Qualunque sia il tuo problema, il dr. Meade lo risolverà.

translation.en: Yeah.
He's waiting for you.
Oh, okay. Um, yeah.
Wow, this is cozy.
[chuckles] Just feeding the little guy.
You know that having fish reduces stress and lowers blood pressure?
translation.it: Sai che i pesci riducono lo stress e abbassano la pressione?

translation.en: [Jenn] No, I didn't.
At least that's what I've heard. Who knows if it's true.
translation.it: Almeno così ho sentito. Chissà se è vero.

translation.en: But I do find them calming.
I'm so glad you decided to come in.
translation.it: Sono felice che tu sia qui.

translation.en: And here I am!
Please.
[Jenn] I don't feel motivated to do anything.
translation.it: Non mi sento motivata a fare niente.

translation.en: Or, like, I should probably stop drinking. I should probably exercise more.
translation.it: Forse dovrei smettere di bere. Dovrei allenarmi di più.

translation.en: I should probably get eight hours of sleep at night.
translation.it: Forse dovrei dormire otto ore a notte.

translation.en: Jennifer, um,
bad habits come from deeper issues.
translation.it: le cattive abitudini derivano da problemi più profondi.

translation.en: There's always a root cause.
translation.it: C'è sempre una causa alla radice.

translation.en: What might that be for you?
I don't know?
Was that a question?
Yes?
Tell me about you and Brian.
He's nice. He's sweet, he's funny, he's smart. It's Brian. I don't know.
translation.it: È gentile, dolce, divertente. È intelligente. È Brian. Non lo so.

translation.en: [exhales] Okay. Fine. Um…
We met in college.
We lived together. We worked together. It was like a whole thing.
translation.it: Vivevamo e lavoravamo insieme. Una cosa intensa.

translation.en: I had a miscarriage.
Actually, I was six months along, so it was a stillbirth.
translation.it: Ero di sei mesi, quindi è nato morto.

translation.en: His name was Daniel.
I got to spend 33 minutes with him.
Brian and I were engaged, and, uh,
translation.it: Io e Brian eravamo fidanzati e…

translation.en: you know, we just couldn't really figure it out after that. So…
translation.it: Non siamo riusciti a uscirne. Quindi…

translation.en: Do you have anything after this?
Have you ever tried hypnotherapy?
[chuckles] No. No, I have not.
Why the judgment?
I'm just not a giving-away-control person,
translation.it: Non sono una persona che dà il controllo agli altri,

translation.en: so it's a pass.
Sure. But here's the wonderful thing about hypnotherapy. All right?
translation.it: Certo. Ma ecco la meraviglia dell'ipnositerapia. Ok?

translation.en: Only you can control your subconscious.
translation.it: Solo tu puoi controllare il tuo subconscio.

translation.en: -[Jenn sighs] -So, you're in control the whole time.
And it's an excellent tool for people who have suffered…
translation.it: Ed è uno strumento eccellente per chi ha subito

translation.en: trauma.
Worst case scenario, it'll stop you from further destroying your poor fingers.
translation.it: Nel peggiore dei casi, smetterai di rovinarti quelle povere dita.

translation.en: [sighs] I don't know.
I had a mentor,
and his name was, uh, Dr. Xavier Sullivan.
He was a brilliant mind. He would say,
"Prosaic methods are reserved for the unimaginative."
translation.it: "I metodi prosaici sono per chi non ha fantasia.

translation.en: "One in search of lasting results dares to open the mind."
translation.it: Chi cerca risultati duraturi ha il coraggio di aprire la mente".

translation.en: -[Meade] Jennifer? -[Jenn exhales]
What do you want?
Just wanna be happy again, you know?
translation.it: Voglio solo essere di nuovo felice.

translation.en: Then let me help you.
I want you to concentrate on the light.
translation.it: Voglio che ti concentri sulla luce.

translation.en: [Meade] Feel the weight of your body as it melts into the couch,
translation.it: Senti il peso del tuo corpo che si scioglie sul divano,

translation.en: muscle by muscle.
Starting at the toes,
the arches of the feet.
[Meade] Calves. Thighs.
All the way up,
until you arrive at the top of your head.
Now,
I want you to find yourself
in a beautiful forest.
That was an hour?
It felt like three minutes.
How do you feel?
[sighs] I don't know. I don't really remember anything.
translation.it: Non lo so. Non ricordo niente.

translation.en: How'd I do?
I think you might be more open to suggestibility
translation.it: Credo che tu sia più aperta alla suggestionabilità

translation.en: than you imagined.
[Jenn] That was bizarre.
They called me right after I left. I start in two weeks.
translation.it: Mi hanno chiamata appena sono uscita. Inizio tra due settimane.

translation.en: Are you gonna do some yoga with me, or you're just gonna lie there?
translation.it: Fai un po' di yoga con me o resti sdraiata lì?

translation.en: This is Shavasana. It is yoga.
How many sessions did you have with Dr. Meade?
translation.it: Quante sedute hai fatto con Meade?

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe, um, once a week for about three months now.
translation.it: Non lo so. Forse una a settimana da circa tre mesi.

translation.en: I've asked him to do hypnosis twice.
translation.it: Gli ho chiesto l'ipnosi due volte.

translation.en: It's not fair. I wanna conquer all of my fears.
translation.it: Non è giusto. Voglio vincere le mie paure.

translation.en: It's a compliment. You've already conquered all your fears.
translation.it: È gratificante, le hai già vinte.

translation.en: Hi, have you seen me and spiders? Didn't think so.
translation.it: Mi hai vista coi ragni? Non credo.

translation.en: I'm really proud of you.
[whispers] You're perfect.
-Hi. -[chuckling] Hi.
-You look fantastic as ever. -Oh, thanks. You too.
translation.it: - Sei in forma come sempre. - Grazie. Idem.

translation.en: Haven't seen you in a couple of weeks. You're not, uh… you're not avoiding me?
translation.it: Non ti vedo da due settimane. Non mi stai evitando?

translation.en: Oh, no. I've been meaning to schedule. It's just I've been busy--
translation.it: No. Volevo venire. Ma sono stata occupata e…

translation.en: -Sure. -Oh…
I got the job.
-What? Really? -Yeah, I did.
-I had no doubt. -You didn't think I could do it?
translation.it: - Non avevo dubbi. - Non ci credeva?

translation.en: No. I never doubted you.
May I buy you a celebratory coffee?
translation.it: Posso offrirti un caffè per festeggiare?

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
-Yeah? -Yeah.
I did yoga with Gina, and I meditated last night.
translation.it: Ho fatto yoga con Gina e ho meditato ieri sera.

translation.en: Amazing.
It was three minutes, and I thought about my dead plants, but I did it.
translation.it: Per tre minuti, pensando alle mie piante morte, ma l'ho fatto.

translation.en: -Progress. Not perfection. -You can't say that. You're one of those people that wakes up at 5:00 a.m.
translation.it: - Progresso. Non perfezione. - Non lei. Di sicuro si sveglia alle 5:00.

translation.en: -and you're perfect at everything. -Hardly.
translation.it: - E fa tutto bene. - Non direi.

translation.en: And one of those who hangs out with his clients but is very private.
translation.it: E frequenta i clienti, ma resta molto riservato.

translation.en: All right.
I'll play.
I'm 46. Only child. [clicks tongue]
Uh, I was married once to the love of my life, Amy.
translation.it: Sono stato sposato con l'amore della mia vita, Amy.

translation.en: We were happy, but she died.
I'm so sorry.
What do they say? "Wanna make God laugh, tell him your plans."
translation.it: Com'era? "Se vuoi far ridere Dio, raccontagli i tuoi progetti."

translation.en: But, Jennifer, the important thing to remember is that being a victim is a choice,
translation.it: Ma, Jennifer, è importante ricordare che essere una vittima è una scelta

translation.en: and we can let our hardships define us,
translation.it: e possiamo farci definire dalle difficoltà,

translation.en: consume us, or we can accept
translation.it: farci consumare da queste o possiamo accettare

translation.en: the extraordinary abilities that we have in this life
translation.it: le straordinarie capacità che abbiamo in questa vita

translation.en: to create the outcome we choose.
-For ourselves. May I? -Mm.
[chuckling] Eyelash.
-[smooth jazz continues over speakers] -Thank you.
All right, well, enough about me. Um…
So, last we spoke, you were struggling a bit with Brian. How's it going there?
translation.it: Nell'ultima seduta, eri in difficoltà con Brian. Come va?

translation.en: I don't know. I have been avoiding him.
When you see Brian, uh,
is it hard for you?
Yeah.
Have you considered telling him this?
And if you did?
He may be hurt because we still care about each other a lot.
translation.it: Ne sarebbe ferito, perché ci vogliamo ancora molto bene.

translation.en: Let me suggest something, and you can take it or leave it,
translation.it: Ti do un suggerimento, che puoi accettare o rifiutare,

translation.en: but I think you'd be wise to take it. [chuckles]
translation.it: ma credo che sarebbe saggio accettarlo.

translation.en: Okay.
Invite Brian to your place for dinner tonight.
translation.it: Invita Brian a cena da te, stasera.

translation.en: -No. -[Meade] Why not?
I can think of infinite reasons why not.
Trust me. You'll be on your turf. You can cook a good meal.
translation.it: Fidati. Sarai nel tuo territorio. Prepari una bella cena.

translation.en: Tell him you got some matters you need to discuss.
translation.it: Gli dici che hai delle cose da discutere.

translation.en: I think it'd be very good for you.
But not easy. I mean, I'm not saying that. But-- But good.
translation.it: Non sarà facile, certo. Ma ti farebbe bene.

translation.en: 'Cause, Jennifer,
you don't have to be a victim anymore.
translation.it: non devi più essere una vittima.

translation.en: [Brian] Hey, it's Brian. I got your message.
translation.it: Sono Brian. Ho ricevuto il tuo messaggio.

translation.en: Yeah, uh, I'll be there.
Let me know if you want me to bring anything. See you soon.
translation.it: Fammi sapere se ti serve qualcosa. A dopo.

translation.en: Hello?
Hey, hey, hey! [sniffles]
Where's your pen?
Where's your--
[Gina] Hey.
It was an accident, Jenn.
I mean, I almost killed him at our housewarming party. You're the one who caught it.
translation.it: L'ho quasi ucciso alla mia festa. L'hai salvato tu.

translation.en: I can't remember anything.
-You're probably just in shock. -No, I'm not in shock.
translation.it: - Sei sotto shock. - No, non è questo.

translation.en: I'm serious. I--
I remember being at the store.
And then I'm at home sitting at the table.
translation.it: E poi a casa, seduta al tavolo.

translation.en: Come on. I'm gonna-- I'm gonna take you home.
[Meade] How's Brian?
Sorry?
Brian. How is he?
He's the same.
-[Meade] How long has it been now? -Eight days.
translation.it: - Da quanto è così? - Otto giorni.

translation.en: Do you remember anything else from that night?
Is there any way that I could be responsible for what happened that night?
translation.it: C'è modo che sia responsabile di ciò è successo quella sera?

translation.en: [Meade] Why do you ask?
Because I can't stop thinking about it.
translation.it: Non riesco a smettere di pensarci.

translation.en: The way it felt,
and the missing time.
It's like what we do here.
[inhales] Do you remember what I told you the first time we discussed hypnosis?
translation.it: Ricordi cosa ti ho detto dell'ipnosi?

translation.en: That only you have the power, control over your subconscious.
translation.it: Che solo tu hai il potere, il controllo sul tuo subconscio.

translation.en: -Yeah, but-- -[Meade] Jennifer, listen to me.
We all have these wounds,
and every time we let the world run us, those wounds fester.
translation.it: e ogni volta che ci lasciamo sopraffare dal mondo, si infettano.

translation.en: But that's a choice based on some preconceived notion
translation.it: Ma è una scelta basata su un'idea preconcetta

translation.en: that the world can even run us in the first place.
translation.it: che il mondo possa persino controllarci.

translation.en: It's ego.
Ego derived from fear.
You follow?
So, the work we're doing is designed to eliminate that fear,
translation.it: Il lavoro che stiamo facendo serve a eliminare quella paura,

translation.en: but the moment you start to doubt our work, fear wins.
translation.it: ma appena cominci a metterlo in discussione, la paura vince.

translation.en: Is that what you want?
To let fear win?
So you need to trust me…
and keep doing the work.
Hello?
[Meade] Jennifer,
carry the fire.
[newswoman] This is a terrible turn of events, as the family is reeling after losing their daughter,
translation.it: Una svolta terribile per la famiglia sconvolta dalla morte della figlia,

translation.en: and they still have no information from police.
translation.it: che non ha ancora informazioni dalla polizia.

translation.en: [newsman] …and in Portland, there's an investigation
translation.it: che non ha ancora informazioni dalla polizia. E a Portland è in corso un'indagine sulla morte della figlia.

translation.en: into the death of their daughter.
translation.it: E a Portland è in corso un'indagine sulla morte della figlia.

translation.en: She'd recently taken out a restraining order on her psychiatrist.
translation.it: Aveva ottenuto un ordine restrittivo contro il suo psichiatra.

translation.en: Of course, it's been a game-changer to the entire case
translation.it: Certo, è stato un punto di svolta per l'intero caso

translation.en: as the police are now looking towards finding out further information as what…
translation.it: mentre la polizia sta cercando di scoprire ulteriori informazioni…

translation.en: [newsman 2] The study into crimes while under hypnosis
translation.it: Lo studio sui crimini sotto ipnosi

translation.en: is new to the state criminal court.
translation.it: è nuovo per il tribunale penale.

translation.en: There are currently board psychiatrists…
[sighs] I don't know, Jenn. It's just-- I get why you'd be concerned.
translation.it: Non lo so, Jenn. Capisco perché ti preoccupi.

translation.en: I mean, it's not exactly comforting news, but I just-- I don't see it.
translation.it: Non è proprio una notizia confortante, ma non ci credo.

translation.en: No, look. It says here in the article,
"Bowen told her family she was experiencing missing time."
translation.it: "Bowen parlò alla famiglia di vuoti temporali".

translation.en: That is what happened to me. It was after I had lunch with Dr. Meade,
translation.it: Ciò che è successo a me. Dopo aver pranzato col dr. Meade,

translation.en: where he suggested I had Brian over for dinner.
translation.it: che ha suggerito di invitare Brian.

translation.en: -It just feels like a big leap. -Look at the background check.
translation.it: - Sembra un po' azzardato. - Controlla i precedenti.

translation.en: You ran a background check?
Yes. Look, the only address listed is his office.
translation.it: Sì. L'unico indirizzo indicato è il suo ufficio.

translation.en: There's no private residence, employers, or unpaid parking tickets.
translation.it: Nessuna residenza, nessun datore di lavoro, nessuna multa.

translation.en: The man is basically a ghost until six months ago
translation.it: Quell'uomo è stato un fantasma fino a sei mesi fa

translation.en: when someone takes out a restraining order. This is his patient,
translation.it: con l'ordine restrittivo. Questa è la sua paziente

translation.en: and he is torturing her. Stalking.
Psychological abuse, emotional abuse.
Maybe she was crazy.
This woman was afraid for her life,
and then three days after she files a restraining order,
translation.it: e tre giorni dopo l'ordine restrittivo,

translation.en: she's dead.
She had a heart attack.
What if there is something else going on?
-What if he did something to her? -Okay. This is where you lose me.
translation.it: - Se le avesse fatto qualcosa? - Ok. È qui che mi perdi.

translation.en: Therapists use hypnotherapy to help their patients quit smoking.
translation.it: Usano l'ipnositerapia per aiutare la gente a smettere di fumare.

translation.en: Not to hack into their brains and stop their heart.
translation.it: Non per entrarle nel cervello o nel cuore.

translation.en: -This is not a thing. -Yes, it-- Look, I thought that too.
translation.it: - Non c'entra niente. - Sì. Senti, lo pensavo anch'io.

translation.en: In Sweden, a group of teenagers are hypnotized to deal drugs, and they experienced blackouts.
translation.it: Un gruppo di ragazzi svedesi ipnotizzato per spacciare lamenta amnesie.

translation.en: In Germany, Zebediah Cantor is hypnotized to rob banks, and he has missing time--
translation.it: In Germania, Zebediah Cantor rapina banche. Ha amnesie!

translation.en: Okay, I get it.
And this is from that night with Brian.
translation.it: E questo è della sera con Brian.

translation.en: He called me, Gina.
Right before I blacked out.
Dr. Meade?
I remember everything now.
I did it on purpose, Gina.
It-- But it wasn't me. It was, it was--
translation.it: Non so come, ma non ero io. Era…

translation.en: But I did do it.
And then I just sat there and watched.
translation.it: E poi sono rimasta seduta a guardare.

translation.en: I didn't do anything.
I didn't get help.
I didn't even move until I came out of it.
translation.it: Non mi sono mossa finché non sono tornata in me.

translation.en: I'm not crazy. [exhales]
So, what do we do?
Hey.
Thank you so much for meeting with us, detective, on such short notice.
translation.it: Grazie per averci ricevute con così poco preavviso, detective.

translation.en: -We really appreciate it. -What can I do for you?
translation.it: - Lo apprezziamo molto. - Cosa posso fare per voi?

translation.en: We wanted to ask you some questions about a woman named Andrea Bowen.
translation.it: Volevamo farle delle domande su una donna di nome Andrea Bowen.

translation.en: Six months ago, she filed a restraining order against Collin Meade.
translation.it: Sei mesi fa, ha emesso un ordine restrittivo contro Collin Meade.

translation.en: I know the case. What's your question?
translation.it: Conosco il caso. Qual è la domanda?

translation.en: Her family said that she died of a heart attack,
translation.it: Secondo la famiglia, è morta di infarto,

translation.en: but then they wanted a broader investigation.
translation.it: ma ha chiesto un'indagine più approfondita.

translation.en: Did that investigation ever happen?
Why are you asking?
Because Dr. Meade is our therapist.
translation.it: Perché il dr. Meade è il nostro terapeuta.

translation.en: Something strange is happening.
Strange how?
I've been having
weird dreams.
But they don't feel like dreams.
You've been practicing hypnosis with Dr. Meade, Miss Thompson?
translation.it: Ha fatto ipnosi col dr. Meade, sig.na Tompson?

translation.en: Collin Meade was brought in for questioning a week after Bowen's death.
translation.it: Ho interrogato Meade una settimana dopo la morte di Bowen.

translation.en: Got us nowhere.
I wanted to keep digging. I got a warrant, obtained his patient records.
translation.it: Ho perseverato. Ho ottenuto un mandato e le schede dei pazienti.

translation.en: Didn't matter. Got shut down that day.
translation.it: Non è bastato. Hanno chiuso il caso quel giorno.

translation.en: Told I couldn't even finish going through what we had.
translation.it: Non ho neanche finito di guardare quello che avevo.

translation.en: Why?
Meade was also practicing hypnosis with Andrea.
translation.it: Meade praticava l'ipnosi anche con Andrea.

translation.en: It's funny. Cops using old witnesses sometimes.
translation.it: È curioso. A volte la polizia la usa sui testimoni.

translation.en: Try and get them to remember things they may have seen. [clicks tongue]
translation.it: Perché ricordino ciò che potrebbero aver visto.

translation.en: If it works,
it becomes evidence in court,
but if you're a victim, claiming someone used hypnosis
translation.it: ma se una vittima dice che qualcuno ha usato l'ipnosi

translation.en: with ill intent, that kinda thing, they'll laugh you out of the room.
translation.it: con cattive intenzioni, non viene presa in considerazione.

translation.en: You don't think she died of a heart attack?
Oh my God!
[detective] And then there's this.
Incoming call came from a blocked number.
-Her behavior changed when she answered. -That happened to me.
translation.it: - Rispondendo, è cambiata. - Com'è successo a me.

translation.en: What is she doing?
You ever heard of "quiescence"?
It's the body's reaction to extreme fear.
translation.it: È la reazione del corpo alla paura.

translation.en: The body enters paralysis, heart rate increases, breathing intensifies.
translation.it: Il corpo si paralizza, il battito accelera e il respiro si intensifica.

translation.en: But if it goes on too long, you die.
Maybe, technically, she died of a heart attack,
but whatever she was seeing in the elevator is what caused it.
translation.it: ma ciò che ha visto nell'ascensore ne è stata la causa.

translation.en: So, what do I think?
I think you should find yourselves a new therapist.
I'll talk to you later, okay?
Yeah.
He hypnotized me.
What?
When?
This week.
We talked about you, I--
It's just-- You were so worried that something happened with Brian, and then he just--
translation.it: Eri così preoccupata di aver fatto qualcosa a Brian e poi…

translation.en: He said he was wrong before, and then he thought that it might help me.
translation.it: Ha detto che si era sbagliato e pensava che potesse aiutarmi.

translation.en: It's okay, it's okay.
We'll do what Det. Rollins said. We'll stay away.
translation.it: Come ha detto Rollins, non ci torniamo.

translation.en: We'll figure this out, okay?
Hey, Dr. Meade, it's Jennifer Thompson. We just saw each other,
translation.it: Dr. Meade, sono Jennifer Tompson. Ci siamo appena visti,

translation.en: but I was wondering if you had any last-minute appointments available.
translation.it: ma mi chiedevo se avesse un posto dell'ultimo minuto.

translation.en: Call me back when you can. Bye.
Jennifer. Please, come in.
-I was thrilled to get your call. -Yeah, thanks for squeezing me in.
translation.it: - Sono felice di vederti. - Grazie per avermi ricevuta.

translation.en: Was there something in particular you wanted to talk about?
translation.it: Volevi parlare di qualcosa in particolare?

translation.en: No. Not-- Nothing really, actually. It's just, um,
translation.it: No. Niente, in realtà. È solo…

translation.en: a general anxiety.
Brian's not awake yet, and so that's hard.
translation.it: Brian non si è ancora svegliato ed è dura.

translation.en: Yeah.
I thought just a bit of hypnosis might help?
translation.it: Pensavo che un po' di ipnosi potesse aiutarmi?

translation.en: Of course.
Okay.
[Wade] Lillian Dorsey.
Date of death, 11/27/2019.
-[phone line trilling] -[Wade] I'm looking for Adrienne Dorsey.
translation.it: CONTATTO PER EMERGENZE: SORELLA Sto cercando Adrienne Dorsey. Sono il det. Wade Rollins.

translation.en: This is Detective Wade Rollins with the Portland PD.
translation.it: Sto cercando Adrienne Dorsey. Sono il det. Wade Rollins.

translation.en: I was hoping I could ask you some questions regarding your sister.
translation.it: Speravo di poterle fare delle domande su sua sorella.

translation.en: Date of death, June 15, 2018. Hypnosis. Andrea Bowen. Hypnosis.
translation.it: Data di morte, 15 giugno 2018. Ipnosi. Andrea Bowen. Ipnosi.

translation.en: [Meade on recording] Was there something in particular you wanted to talk about?
translation.it: Volevi parlare di qualcosa in particolare?

translation.en: [Jenn] I thought just a bit of hypnosis might help?
translation.it: Pensavo che un po' di ipnosi potesse aiutarmi?

translation.en: [Meade] Of course.
[Meade] Jennifer?
-[Jenn] Yes? -[Meade] Are you under?
-[Jenn] Yes. -[Meade] Good.
I'm going to ask you some questions, and you're gonna tell me the truth.
translation.it: Ti farò qualche domanda e tu mi dirai la verità.

translation.en: Why did you really come see me today?
translation.it: Perché sei venuta da me oggi?

translation.en: [Jenn] To record you.
[Meade] Are you recording me now?
[Jenn] Yes.
-[Meade] And why are you recording me? -[menacing music]
[Jenn] Because I want to hear what happens during our sessions.
translation.it: Per sentire cosa succede durante le sedute.

translation.en: -[Meade] Do you not trust me? -[Jenn] No.
translation.it: - Non ti fidi di me? - No.

translation.en: Why not?
[Jenn] Because I know about Andrea Bowen.
[Meade] Is this why you were at the police station this morning?
translation.it: Per questo sei stata alla polizia stamani?

translation.en: [Jenn] Yes.
[Meade] You were with Gina.
I assume she knows everything you know.
-[Jenn] Yes. -[Meade] Yes.
Thank you for being honest, my love.
-[Scott] Dude, what quarter is it? -[Gina] Tell him to not--
No, they are not up by seven, bro! [laughs]
translation.it: No, non sono aumentati di sette!

translation.en: -I'm serious. Hang up. -I gotta go before she kills me.
translation.it: - Chiamano tra un minuto. - Vado prima che mi uccida.

translation.en: -See? -No, it's Jenn!
Tell him I told him wassup! Keep me informed. Yeah, okay, peace.
translation.it: Digli che lo saluto. Tienimi informato. Sì, ok, ciao.

translation.en: Girl, I gotta call you back. I have buyers calling any minute.
translation.it: Ti richiamo io. Mi chiamano gli acquirenti ora.

translation.en: -Gina. Gina, where are you? -I'm just in the car with Scott.
translation.it: - Gina. Dove sei? - Sono in macchina con Scott.

translation.en: -[Scott] Hey, Jenny. -Where are you?
We just left the house.
Turn around and go back to the house.
translation.it: Gira e torna subito a casa.

translation.en: -I'm coming to you. -What? Why?
Could you go back to the house? You need to go back, listen to me.
translation.it: Puoi tornare a casa? Devi tornare indietro. Scendi dall'auto…

translation.en: -Gina, get-- -I'm sorry, you're cutting out. I can't--
translation.it: Devi tornare indietro. Scendi dall'auto… Non ti sento bene. Non posso…

translation.en: This is them. I'll call you back.
No, Gina! He knows we were at the police station. He knows!
translation.it: No, Gina. Sa che siamo state alla polizia. Lo sa!

translation.en: Fucking shit!
This is Gina.
[Meade] Gina, it's Dr. Meade. Sorry to bother you, but do you have a moment to chat?
translation.it: Gina, sono il dr. Meade. Scusa il disturbo, ma puoi parlare?

translation.en: I'm just in the car with Scott.
[Meade] Even better. Gina, this is how the world ends.
translation.it: Ancora meglio. Gina, è così che finisce il mondo.

translation.en: What was that?
[quietly] Get it off of me.
What?
-[Scott] Gina. -[Gina shudders]
-Get what off? -Get it off. Please!
translation.it: Cosa? - Toglilo. Ti prego. - Cosa? Non c'è niente.

translation.en: What? There's nothing there. Get what off?
translation.it: - Toglilo. Ti prego. - Cosa? Non c'è niente.

translation.en: -Get it off of me! Please! -Gina, relax. Gina!
[screaming] Get it off!
Gina, stop!
Get it off! Get it off!
-[truck horn blares] -[Scott] No!
Detective Rollins. What a pleasant surprise.
Care for a scotch?
Gina Kaleman died in a car accident tonight.
translation.it: Gina Kelman è morta in un incidente stasera.

translation.en: [Meade] What?
-Her husband too. -You're kidding me.
Oh my God.
How long was she a patient?
[Meade] I don't know. Maybe…
…eight months?
-[Wade] What were you treating her for? -She came to me with some, uh…
translation.it: Per cosa la curava? Venne da me per una sorta

translation.en: …generalized anxiety initially.
You ever perform hypnosis on Gina?
translation.it: Ha mai praticato l'ipnosi su Gina?

translation.en: Yes. Uh, we performed our first session last week.
translation.it: Sì. Abbiamo fatto la prima seduta la scorsa settimana.

translation.en: Started small, you know?
-Explored her common phobia. -Claustrophobia?
Arachnophobia.
The last claustrophobic patient I dealt with was, uh…
translation.it: L'ultima paziente claustrofobica con cui ho avuto a che fare

translation.en: Well, it was Andrea Bowen, actually.
You know what I always loved as a kid?
translation.it: Sa cosa mi piaceva da bambino?

translation.en: Puzzles.
I'm sure it has something to do with why I became a detective.
translation.it: Sarà il motivo per cui sono diventato detective.

translation.en: Putting the pieces together, finding the patterns.
translation.it: Mettere insieme i pezzi, trovare gli schemi.

translation.en: That was always the key.
Patterns.
I looked through some of your patient files today.
translation.it: Ho guardato le schede dei suoi pazienti oggi.

translation.en: The ones we obtained after Andrea's death.
translation.it: Quelle avute dopo la morte di Andrea.

translation.en: I got to chat with family members, and I noticed something.
translation.it: Ho parlato coi familiari e ho notato una cosa.

translation.en: A pattern.
You don't use hypnotherapy on all of your patients.
translation.it: Non usa l'ipnositerapia su ogni paziente.

translation.en: Just a few, actually.
They share some physical characteristics,
and they also all happen to be dead.
You ever noticed that?
That pattern?
Gina Kaleman doesn't match your MO. I think you had something else in mind when it came to her.
translation.it: Il modus operandi di Gina non corrisponde, ma penso avesse in mente qualcos'altro.

translation.en: Is there something specific you wanted to talk about tonight, Wade?
translation.it: C'è qualcosa di specifico di cui volevi parlare stasera, Wade?

translation.en: Because if not, I should be going. It's getting late.
[Wade] It's Detective Rollins.
-Thanks for the booze. -[Meade] Oh, Wade.
Hypnotherapy works wonders for insomnia.
You wanna try it? I'll give you a free session.
Thought you only took female patients.
I'll make an exception.
My phone died, or I would have called.
Um, I heard about your friend.
I just thought I could catch him saying something or doing something.
translation.it: Pensavo di poterlo sorprendere a dire o a fare qualcosa.

translation.en: He was at the station. He's been following us.
translation.it: Era al dipartimento. Ci stava seguendo.

translation.en: He's smart.
Always a step ahead.
There's a reason he never hypnotized Gina until you started asking questions.
translation.it: Non ha ipnotizzato Gina finché tu non ha iniziato a dubitare.

translation.en: He knew you would go to her. She got in the way.
translation.it: Sapeva che andavi da lei. Lo intralciava.

translation.en: You can't blame yourself, Jenn.
And just why me?
Well, I don't know.
But not long after Andrea started asking questions, she was dead.
translation.it: Ma quando Andrea ha iniziato a dubitare, è morta.

translation.en: He's not done with you yet, or you would be too.
translation.it: Non ha ancora finito con te o lo saresti anche tu.

translation.en: I got his prints. I'm gonna run 'em, see if we're missing anything.
translation.it: Ho le sue impronte. Le controllerò. Vediamo se ci manca qualcosa.

translation.en: I should know more tomorrow.
For now,
lay low.
[Jenn] Detective.
Thank you.
Try and get some rest.
I'll call you in the morning.
Did you forget something? Hello, Jennifer.
Jennifer, stop!
You don't need to be afraid of me. I just wanna talk.
translation.it: Non devi aver paura di me. Voglio solo parlare.

translation.en: What did I do to you to make you not trust me?
translation.it: Cosa ti ho fatto per non meritarmi la tua fiducia?

translation.en: [firmly] Think about it.
I invited you in. I listened.
translation.it: Ti ho invitata. Ti ho ascoltata.

translation.en: Really, you should be thanking me.
I asked you what you wanted, and I'm working so hard to give you that.
translation.it: Ti ho chiesto cosa volevi e sto lavorando sodo per dartelo.

translation.en: And Brian and Gina were just gonna get in the way of your dreams.
translation.it: E Brian e Gina avrebbero ostacolato i tuoi sogni.

translation.en: And now Rollins.
Don't worry. He'll be taken care of.
Everything I'm doing is for you, Jennifer.
translation.it: Tutto ciò che faccio è per te, Jennifer.

translation.en: And I know there's been a lot of build-up and anticipation, but…
translation.it: E so che ci è voluto un po', c'è stata molta preparazione, ma…

translation.en: that's just the romantic in me.
translation.it: È il lato romantico che c'è in me.

translation.en: -It's almost over. -[Jenn shudders]
[quietly] You're so close.
I'll see you soon, okay?
Oh, Jennifer… -Relax. -[Jenn gasps]
[quietly] Pick up. Pick up.
[Wade] This is Detective Wade Rollins--
Come on, come on.
[woman on TV] When the police ran his prints,
translation.it: Dalle impronte, la polizia ha scoperto la sua vera identità.

translation.en: they discovered his real identity. He had changed his name.
translation.it: Dalle impronte, la polizia ha scoperto la sua vera identità. Aveva cambiato nome.

translation.en: [man on TV] And who was he, really?
[woman] A killer. Wanted for murder in three states.
translation.it: Un assassino. Ricercato per omicidio in tre stati.

translation.en: -[menacing music] -[TV dialogue continues]
translation.it: Ero sotto shock e mi sembrava di impazzire.

translation.en: [male narrator] Tonight, on The Crime Files.
In the fall of 2014,
seventeen-year-old Victoria Wilson disappeared from her suburban home
translation.it: Victoria Wilson, 17 anni, scomparse dalla sua casa in periferia

translation.en: in Metuchen, New Jersey,
leaving her parents and four younger siblings
translation.it: lasciando genitori e quattro fratelli piccoli

translation.en: heartbroken and terrified.
Three days later, her body was found in a forest 300 miles from home.
translation.it: Tre giorni dopo, il suo corpo fu trovato in una foresta a 500 km da casa.

translation.en: So, what happened to Victoria Wilson?
Billy Adler came home from school
to find his mom dead at the dining room table, shot in the head.
translation.it: trovando sua madre sul tavolo da pranzo, uccisa da uno sparo alla testa.

translation.en: The police ruled it a suicide. But Billy knew his mom would nev--
translation.it: La polizia dichiarò il suicidio. Ma Billy sapeva che sua madre non…

translation.en: I can't tell them I think Meade was involved.
translation.it: Non posso dire che Meade è coinvolto.

translation.en: They don't know I've been digging into this.
I'm so sorry, Rollins.
You read 'em?
And?
And I have an idea.
When Gina and I came to see you, you said something about
translation.it: Quando Gina e io siamo venute da lei, ha detto

translation.en: how police sometimes use hypnosis.
What did you mean?
A drive-by shooter speeds away from the scene.
translation.it: Un cecchino in auto si allontana dalla scena.

translation.en: An eyewitness saw the car but can't remember the license plate.
translation.it: Un testimone ha visto l'auto, ma non ricorda la targa.

translation.en: [clears throat] Well, maybe they do remember it.
Just not consciously.
So, we send them to a hypnotist who tries to help them recall.
translation.it: Lo mandiamo da un ipnotizzatore che cerca di aiutarlo a ricordare.

translation.en: And that will hold up as evidence?
-Sometimes. -What if we did that?
What if you sent me to whoever you use for that sort of thing?
translation.it: Se mi mandasse da chi usate per questo genere di cose?

translation.en: And they put me under
and try to make me recall my sessions with Meade.
translation.it: per farmi ricordare le sedute con Meade.

translation.en: -It still may not be enough. -You just said--
I said, "Sometimes."
Do you know how hard it is to charge someone with murder
translation.it: È difficile accusare qualcuno di omicidio

translation.en: and get them convicted?
But he all but confessed to me that he's responsible for Brian and Gina.
translation.it: Ma mi ha quasi confessato di aver ucciso Brian e Gina.

translation.en: -You recorded it? -He said he was coming after--
translation.it: - È registrato? - E che veniva da lei.

translation.en: With everything else we have, the other victims, the pattern…
translation.it: Con tutto il resto che abbiamo. Le altre vittime. Lo schema.

translation.en: He's planning something. I know he is.
I don't know what, but the way he was talking last night--
translation.it: Non so cosa, ma il modo in cui parlava ieri…

translation.en: Please.
I just wanna try.
Please wake up.
[Meade] You were with Gina.
I assume she knows everything you know.
-[Jenn] Yes. -[Meade] Yes.
Well, thank you for being honest, my love.
I'll take all of your concerns into consideration.
And then he cuts it short.
How much do you really know about hypnotherapy?
translation.it: Quanto sai in realtà di ipnositerapia?

translation.en: [sniffles] Not much.
Well, it's an incredibly powerful tool.
When handled with care and integrity, it can be a force for good.
translation.it: Se gestito con attenzione e integrità, può essere una forza positiva.

translation.en: But in the wrong hands, hypnosis can be dangerous.
translation.it: Ma nelle mani sbagliate, può essere pericolosa.

translation.en: What are you feeling?
[exhales deeply] I am having, um, some trust issues with your profession right now.
translation.it: Ho dei problemi di fiducia con la sua professione al momento.

translation.en: Jenn, I understand that this may not be worth much,
translation.it: Jenn, capisco bene che potrebbe non valere molto,

translation.en: but you can trust me.
I'm one of the good ones.
And I'm only gonna have a look around.
Just see what the subconscious retained from those sessions with Dr. Meade.
translation.it: per vedere cos'è rimasto nel subconscio delle sedute col dr. Meade.

translation.en: [doctor] Focus on the sound of the metronome,
keeping time.
And as you feel the weight of your body
translation.it: E mentre senti il peso del tuo corpo

translation.en: sinking into the couch,
I want you to let everything go.
Let the world around you slow down.
translation.it: Lascia che il mondo intorno a te rallenti.

translation.en: [doctor] Jenn, can you hear me?
[Jenn] Yes.
[doctor] Now, I want you to tell me everything you remember
translation.it: Ora voglio che tu mi dica tutto ciò che ricordi

translation.en: from your sessions with Dr. Collin Meade.
translation.it: delle tue sedute col dr. Collin Meade.

translation.en: Wake up, Jenn.
I need you to listen to the sound of my voice
translation.it: Devi ascoltare il suono della mia voce

translation.en: and come back to this room right now!
translation.it: e tornare subito in questa stanza!

translation.en: [Meade] My mentor was a psychiatrist.
translation.it: Il mio mentore era uno psichiatra.

translation.en: -[doctor] Wake up, Jennifer! -[Jenn screams]
What happened?
Dr. Graham, what happened?
I've never seen anything like that.
translation.it: Non ho mai visto niente di simile.

translation.en: He must have planted some sort of
fail-safe or--
What's a fail-safe?
In case anybody ever tried to do what we're doing.
translation.it: Nel caso qualcuno provasse a fare questo.

translation.en: And I have no way of knowing
translation.it: E non ho modo di sapere

translation.en: how many sustained post-hypnotic suggestions he placed.
translation.it: quante suggestioni post-ipnotiche ti ha messo.

translation.en: And these can be triggered at any given moment.
I remember something.
There was a house.
What's today's date?
It's the sixth.
-I have to go. -No, wait.
There's one more thing I could try.
Look, I can't remove all of his suggestions, but maybe I could plant something of my own.
translation.it: Non posso rimuovere tutte le suggestioni, ma forse potrei impiantare qualcosa io.

translation.en: Like a counter trigger?
Exactly.
I swear to God, this is the last time I'm doing this.
translation.it: Giuro su Dio che questa è l'ultima volta.

translation.en: [Jenn] Rollins, it didn't work.
But I found out that Meade has a mentor named Xavier Sullivan.
translation.it: Ma ho scoperto che Meade ha un mentore: Xavier Sullivan.

translation.en: [Wade] Okay. [Jenn] Have you heard of "Project MKUltra"?
[Wade] Yeah, it was a CIA project in the '60s.
translation.it: Sì, era un progetto CIA negli anni '60.

translation.en: [Jenn] Well, Sullivan is a hypnotist. And the CIA had recruited him
translation.it: Beh, Sullivan è un ipnotizzatore. E la CIA l'aveva reclutato

translation.en: to use hypnosis to plant false memories in people.
translation.it: per impiantare falsi ricordi nelle persone.

translation.en: I'm on my way to see him.
[Wade] No, Jenn, that's not a good idea.
translation.it: No, non è una buona idea.

translation.en: [Jenn] He might know something about Meade that can help us.
translation.it: Credo sappia qualcosa su Meade che può aiutarci.

translation.en: -[Wade] Just wait for me. -[Jenn] We don't have time.
[Wade] Jenn. Jenn!
[Jenn] Mr. Sullivan?
Hello?
Anybody home?
Mr. Sullivan?
[Jenn] Oh my God.
[Meade] It's uncanny, isn't it?
My wife was such a beautiful woman,
translation.it: Mia moglie era una donna bellissima,

translation.en: but then so are you, Jennifer.
translation.it: ma lo sei anche tu, Jennifer.

translation.en: -I don't understand. -Xavier was my father.
translation.it: - Non capisco. - Xavier era mio padre.

translation.en: He left me this place when he died.
translation.it: È morto e la casa è mia.

translation.en: -No, just wait. -Sleep.
It's Rollins.
[man] Hey, Rollins. I ran the prints from that spoon.
translation.it: Ehi, Rollins. Ho controllato le impronte. Erano di un uomo di nome Julian Sullivan.

translation.en: They belonged to a man named Julian Sullivan.
translation.it: Ho controllato le impronte. Erano di un uomo di nome Julian Sullivan.

translation.en: Info's in your inbox.
[Jenn's voice] You reached Jenn Thompson. Leave a message.
Son of a bitch!
-[Wade] Jenn, where are you? -Rollins, it was Meade.
translation.it: - Jenn, dove sei? - Rollins, era Meade.

translation.en: -His real name is Sullivan. -Jenn, tell me where you are.
translation.it: - Il suo vero nome è Sullivan. - Dimmi dove sei.

translation.en: He brought me back to his office.
-[Wade] But where is he? -Door is locked. I don't know!
translation.it: - Lui dov'è? - È chiusa. Non lo so.

translation.en: I'm sending units now. Hey, taxi! [groans]
Move! Drive!
How are you feeling?
Jennifer, take a seat.
You know…
I'll never forget that first time I saw you.
translation.it: non scorderò mai la prima volta che ti ho vista.

translation.en: -Give me something. -[man] We've entered the building.
[Meade] You look like her,
walk like her,
you even smell like her.
There's nothing quite like a woman's scent.
translation.it: Non c'è niente come l'odore di una donna.

translation.en: The moment you catch it, it's just…
translation.it: Nel momento in cui lo cogli, è come…

translation.en: [quietly] Just like that.
Memories.
Come on.
[agent] On the floor. Approaching suite.
There were a few others,
and they seemed right at first,
but ultimately,
they just weren't meant to be.
We're at the door.
What are you waiting for? Get in!
[Meade] I mean, I see why now, though.
They were close.
But you're perfect.
Move, move!
And now I have you all to myself.
translation.it: E ora ti ho tutta per me.

translation.en: [squad leader] On my count.
[Meade] Jennifer.
You can wake up now.
[shakily] Where am I?
You're home.
-Sir, there's no one here. -What do you mean there's no one there?
translation.it: - Signore. Non c'è nessuno qui. - Che diavolo significa?

translation.en: The office is empty, sir.
He wanted her to call me.
Detective Wade Rollins to dispatch. I need a residential address to one Xavier Sullivan.
translation.it: Det. Wade Rollins. Mi serve l'indirizzo di un certo Xavier Sullivan.

translation.en: -[dispatch] Copy that. -[tires screech]
[gulps] I can't move.
I know.
I'm not thrilled you started biting your nails again.
translation.it: Non sono felice che ti morda di nuovo le unghie.

translation.en: We'll have to work on that.
[quietly] I know this room.
I was hoping you'd recognize it.
They weren't dreams.
Oh, they were your memories with her.
translation.it: Erano i tuoi ricordi con lei.

translation.en: Some of my favorites.
You put them in my head
translation.it: Me li hai messi in testa

translation.en: because you're trying to replace her.
The power of hypnosis.
The memory, planted in the mind,
given the right amount of care and attention,
translation.it: con la giusta cura e attenzione,

translation.en: will blossom into a whole new reality.
A whole new life.
Make someone believe they're somewhere they're not or,
translation.it: Far credere a qualcuno di essere chi non è

translation.en: you know, paralyze from head to toe, all with a simple suggestion.
translation.it: o paralizzarlo dalla testa ai piedi con una semplice suggestione.

translation.en: My mentor taught me at--
translation.it: Il mio mentore mi ha insegnato a…

translation.en: -Oh my gosh, a very young age. -Your father?
translation.it: - Oddio, ero molto giovane. - Tuo padre?

translation.en: Father, mentor. Interchangeable for a young boy. [chuckles]
translation.it: Beh, padre, mentore. Intercambiabile per un ragazzino.

translation.en: You're insane.
[whispers] I am not insane.
[quietly] We want the same thing.
We share wounds.
Your loss of Brian and your son Daniel.
translation.it: La tua perdita di Brian e di tuo figlio Daniel.

translation.en: My loss of Amy
and the life I thought we'd have together.
translation.it: e la vita che dovevamo condividere.

translation.en: We will be that for each other.
Go like this.
-And now, for the grand finale. -[sniffles]
[quietly] Don't move.
[Meade] You don't happen to know today's date, do you?
translation.it: Sai per caso che giorno è oggi?

translation.en: Now you know why I waited.
Our anniversary.
I told you,
I'm a romantic. [laughs]
[softly] And there she is.
My beautiful bride.
You're perfect.
-[Jenn gasps] No. -Jennifer, don't let go.
[screams] Rollins!
[Wade] Jenn!
Rollins! Rollins, I'm in here.
-Where is he? -He went out the back.
translation.it: - Lui dov'è? - È uscito dal retro.

translation.en: -I'm trapped. You have to help me. -[Wade] The door is locked.
translation.it: - Sono bloccata. Aiutami. - La porta è chiusa.

translation.en: Jenn, listen to me.
I have to go find him. You're gonna be okay.
What? No, no, no! Rollins, no!
Please don't go! You can't go! Please don't go!
translation.it: Ti prego, non andartene. No, ti prego.

translation.en: [panting] Okay. Come on. Just focus. Focus.
I'm okay. I'm okay. [panting]
[Jenn] Rollins!
[Wade] Jenn, the gun!
[Meade] Jennifer, sleep!
[Wade] Jenn? Jenn?
It's Rollins. Wake up, Jenn.
-[Jenn gasps] -That's it, wake up. That's it. No.
-You're okay. -No.
-Where is he? Where is he? -He's gone.
-It's over. You're okay. -[Jenn panting]
I called in for backup. They'll be here shortly.
You're okay.
You're…
You're a good shot.
-Oh, sorry. -It's okay.
-Here. -Thank you.
[groans] Here. Here.
You're gonna be fine.
I promise, my love.
[doctor] Jenn.
In the recording you played me,
Dr. Meade called you "my love."
translation.it: il dr. Meade ti ha chiamata "amore mio".

translation.en: [Meade] Thank you for being honest, my love.
If you are ever under a post-hypnotic suggestion
translation.it: Se sei sotto una suggestione post-ipnotica

translation.en: by Dr. Collin Meade, and he refers to you as "my love,"
translation.it: da parte del dr. Collin Meade e ti chiama "amore mio",

translation.en: you will ignore
every single trigger he put into your head.
translation.it: ogni singolo innesco che ti ha messo in testa.

translation.en: And you will see the world around you
translation.it: E vedrai il mondo intorno a te

translation.en: for what it truly is.
-I'm not your love. -[groans]
-[Jenn] No! -No, no, no.
[whispering] Rollins.
Oh my God! Oh God.
Hey, hey! Wake up. Please wake up.
-Come on. -[weakly] Ankle.
What?
[Wade] Ankle.
[Meade] Come here!
Hey. No, no, no! Hey, hey, hey! Hi.
Right here. Look at me, look at me. Look at me, look at me. Yes.
Hi, hi! You're okay, you're okay.
-[weakly] You shot me. -[Jenn] I'm sorry.
Stay-- Yeah. Stay with me. Hi. You're okay. You're gonna be okay.
translation.it: Resta… Sì. Resta con me. Ciao. Stai bene. Andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: -[whispering] Stay with me, okay? -[sirens wailing]
[Jenn] I can hear them. I hear sirens. They are coming. It's okay.
translation.it: Li sento. Sento le sirene. Stanno arrivando. Va tutto bene.

translation.en: You're gonna be okay. You're gonna be okay.
I think it's great. We present it to the team at Monday's meeting.
translation.it: Ottimo. Lo presentiamo al team alla riunione di lunedì,

translation.en: But I'm a huge fan.
Uh-huh. Great work, Tiff.
Yeah, I'll see you then.
I'm definitely moving. [chuckles]
You'll like the new place. You don't have to. I understand.
translation.it: Adorerai la nuova casa. Non devi. Capisco.

translation.en: I know you're very particular about your things.
translation.it: Sei esigente riguardo alle tue cose.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I left.
I'm sorry I didn't share my grief with you.
translation.it: Di non aver condiviso il mio dolore.

translation.en: I'm sorry that I thought losing Daniel
translation.it: Di aver pensato che perdere Daniel

translation.en: was harder for me than it was for you.
And I know it's not my fault what happened to him. No matter how much I wanna blame myself.
translation.it: E so che la sua morte non è colpa mia. Non importa quanto voglia punirmi.

translation.en: But it is my fault what happened to us.
translation.it: Ma è colpa mia quello che è successo a noi.

translation.en: And for that, I'm really, truly sorry.
The doctors say your tests are promising.
That's really good news.
And when you wake up, I'll be sitting right here.
translation.it: E quando ti sveglierai, sarò qui.

translation.en: -My condolences on your promotion. -[chuckles]
I'm regretting it already.
I left you alone, but I did wanna say thank you
translation.it: Ti ho lasciato in pace, ma volevo ringraziarti

translation.en: for everything.
I wasn't sure when I'd see you again, but…
I figured you'd come around eventually.
A token of my appreciation.
Take care of yourself, yeah?
Well played.
